info.name: DarkJupyter
info.description:
Dark theme for Jupyter notebooks. It affects notebooks viewed on http://localhost:8888

06/25/2017: fixes for CodeMirror's VIM mode (cursor, command prompt, etc)
info.additionalInfo:
It uses Mononoki font as default. For turning matplotlib's plots into the dark palette one needs to set up following parameters in .config/matplotlib/matplotlibrc file:

lines.color : 5050f0
lines.antialiased : True
text.color : d0d0d0
axes.facecolor : 151515
axes.edgecolor : 303030
axes.grid : True
axes.labelcolor : green
axes.prop_cycle : cycler('color', 'bgrcmyw')
xtick.color : 606060
ytick.color : 606060
grid.color : 406040
legend.fontsize : small
figure.figsize : 10,6
